section.heading: Prepayment premium, fee or charge.
section.text: A lender shall not include in a covered loan or collect or attempt to collect any prepayment premium, fee, or charge in violation of Chapter 33 of Title 28.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 212 of Home Loan Protection Emergency Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-295, March 1, 2002, 49 DCR 2534).
